name: TrashBash Recycling RPG
description:
Do you want to learn more about recycling and waste management? Play TrashBash, a single-player role-playing game that teaches you about sustainability in an interactive way. Pick up litter and recycle plastic to gain points, sidestep toxic waste puddles to avoid losing points, and explore rooms to get pop up facts about waste management. Defeat the dangerous trio of the TrashBash villains– Lord Landfill, Waste Face, and Dump Grump– in epic fights. 

Explore, learn, and help  the environment, one Boss Battle at a time.
